Articles.Content:
In honor of the Developers managing to kill 24 brave Kerbal souls during this years Kerbalkon I have edited this picture originally created by 10dowg10 and posted on deviantart.

Mine:

http://9gag.com/gag/aNeDYZ4/

Original

http://01dawg10.deviantart.com/art/KSP-Kerbal-Space-Program-Fan-Art-363155165

Edited December 13, 2013 by Mustanger

Good idea but you can improve the final result by working on the fonts.

For instance :

- "The great Kerbal..." is your title : do not use the same font that the text on the bottom For titles you can use Nasalyzation (to stay in the mood), Futura/Brandon (to avoid risks) or maybe something more visually impacting like HFF High Tension.

- your bottom text : not same font that title, you should center-align it. and use a very very "straight" font. You're talking 'bout 24 deaths buddy ! Try it out with Helvetica or Bebas.

Put it in 2 lines of text, white color with a #000033 outline.

These are just advices to improve your work, I'm pretty sure you'll enjoy them
Thanks its a bit hard to be creative while you're more than a few drinks into a bottle of whiskey. I will probably make it a little better here in a few days.

Good idea but you can improve the final result by working on the fonts.

For instance :

- "The great Kerbal..." is your title : do not use the same font that the text on the bottom For titles you can use Nasalyzation (to stay in the mood), Futura/Brandon (to avoid risks) or maybe something more visually impacting like HFF High Tension.

- your bottom text : not same font that title, you should center-align it. and use a very very "straight" font. You're talking 'bout 24 deaths buddy ! Try it out with Helvetica or Bebas.

Put it in 2 lines of text, white color with a #000033 outline.

These are just advices to improve your work, I'm pretty sure you'll enjoy them

I think the entire thing should be done in comic sans. XD
Love it! The kerbal in the background cracks me up.

Poor kerbals.

You know kerbalkon went to a A4 party? (After after after after party) the A3 party (4kbshort) was passed onto a less well known streamer. Only 5 people actually saw the official end to kerbalkon. (I was one)

I really like the first one, the kerbals expression in the back ground, could do with something in the sky however

Like I said in the original post I didn't make the artwork the credit for that goes to 10dowg10 on deviantart.com I simply added some words to the picture because it seemed to clearly show the fears that the Kerbals have to Kerbalkon.

I think the entire thing should be done in comic sans. XD
Burn in hell man... Burn in hell...

,)
